title: Workshop for Expanding Teacher Imagination for Eco-Social Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ecological education concepts and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Art-based workshops for teacher managers in language education companies, utilizing digital tools

learning_goals: Participants present three or more educational practice strategies based on eco-social relational concepts
Production of visual outputs illustrating connectivity between the "more-than-human-world" using digital collage techniques
Design and present two or more imagination-based teaching methods applicable in educational settings
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
